EmailTemplate.name: Approved Deployment Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Access Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
RaagviTech Company
Dear {!Access__c.OwnerFullName}, Your Request for the profile : " {!Access__c.Profile_to_Update__c} " and Permission set "{!Access__c.Permission_to_Update__c}" are Approved.
I am pleased to inform you that the deployment has been approved.
Note: The Access is going to revoke on {!Access__c.Access_Expire_Date__c} at {!Access__c.Access_Expire_Time__c}. Thank you, RaagviTech Company
Copyright 2023, All rights reserved. Our mailing address: RaagviTech Company Kudlu Gate, Hosur Road. Bengaluru, India 590 006
